name: Back to the future where OOP meets design patterns

description.html:
This month we welcome Ismael Velasco (@devonajourney)
We will be hosting this event on zoom and will send out the details on the evening.

Back to the future where OOP meets design patterns
This talk will revisit the original pattern movement to see what its design thinking might still offer us today. Diving into design patterns, it will explore concepts like habitability, pattern sequences, pattern stories, pattern languages, and the ethical goal behind patterns.
